page.title: 08SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: At school we play football on the field and Hide and Seek but on wet days we go on to the playground and play line Catch, catch, Hop Scoth, Pac man and Army games. The main game boys play is football. Some of the girls play football but not many. The rules of our school football are that each team has 6 or 11 players. The main aim is to score goals (to get the ball into the other teams net) it must be passed to the other players or dribbled and taken by one person. If you unfairly tackle a player of the other team it is called a "foul" and they have a free kick, or a penalty when they can try for a goal with only the goalkeeper to beat. The game is controlled by a referee.
